00016 Sender::~Sender() {
00017 
00018         stop();

00020 
00021 void Sender::Send(Smpp::Header* h) {
00022         Data* data = new Data();
00023         data->hdr = h;
00024         queue->push(data);
00025 }
00026 
00027 Sender::Sender(Queue<Data*>* q, Inspector* i) {
00028         MT_LOGINIT(Sender);
00029         queue = q;
00030         inspector = i;
00031         sock = NULL;
00032         m_systemId = inspector->getSystemId();
00033         needEnqLink = false;
00034         time_t t;
00035         t = time(&t);
00036         lastActivity = t;
00037         m_sockFd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00038 
00039 
00040 }
00041 
00042 void Sender::stop() {
00043 
00044         notifyInspector = false;
00045         Deactivate();
00046         Data* data = new Data();
00047         data->terminate = true;
00048         queue->push(data);
00049         InfiniteThread::stop();
00050 
00051 }
00052 
00053 void Sender::runLoop() {
00054 
00055         //      Processor *proc = (Processor*) sndr->inspector->GetProcessor();
00056 
00057         int bytesSent;
00058         time_t t;
00059         t = time(&t);
00060 
00061         //      lastActivity = t;
00062 
00063         if (IsActive()) {
00064 
00065                 Data* data = queue->pop();
00066 
00067                 if (data == NULL) {
00068                         return;
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 if (data->terminate) {
00072                         MT_LOGWARNING("Sender is terminating. break");
00073                         Deactivate();
00074                         delete data;
00075                         return;
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 struct timeval tmVal;
00079                 tmVal.tv_sec = m_sendTimeout / 1000000L;
00080                 tmVal.tv_usec = m_sendTimeout % 1000000L;
00081 
00082                 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, &tmVal);
00083 
00084                 if (needEnqLink) {
00085                         if ((data->msg != NULL) && (data->msg->type == ENQ_LINK)) {
00086                                 if (t < lastActivity + 10) {
00087                                         delete data;
00088                                         return;
00089                                 }
00090                                 MT_LOGDEBUG("send enq link")
00091                         }
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 lastActivity = t;
00095                 bytesSent = SendPdu(sock, data->hdr);
00096                 if (bytesSent < 0) {
00097                         MT_LOGWARNING("send return error");
00098                         queue->push(data);
00099                         Deactivate();
00100                         return;
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 if (data->msg != NULL && data->msg->type == UNBIND) {
00104                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&(data->unbindMtx));
00105                         Deactivate();
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 delete data;
00109 
00110         } else {
00111                 MT_LOGWARNING("Sender is inactive. break");
00112                 if (notifyInspector)
00113                         inspector->NetworkError(this);
00114         }
00115 
00116         return;
00117 }
00118 
00119 }
00120 }
